item.title: Applications of Fast Magnetic Reconnection Models to the Atmospheres of the Sun and Protoplanetary Disks
item.content:encoded:
部分电离等离子体、磁重连、太阳大气层、原行星盘、快速磁重连
部分电离等离子体对磁重连过程有影响，特别是在太阳大气层和原行星盘中。碰撞改变了磁耗散加热的速率和位置，以及加速到非热尾部的粒子能量分布。在密切耦合碰撞的情况下，磁重连会快速发生，并形成磁岛，但很快会因为理想的撕裂不稳定性而崩溃。当进入碰撞解耦的阶段时，磁能会迅速转化为热能和带电粒子动能，导致太阳大气层和原行星盘中的局部加热和能量释放。这种解耦的快速磁重连可能导致太阳冕层中离子和电子的优先加热和能量激发，以及在原行星盘中产生红外原子和分子线发射。

总结: 部分电离等离子体对磁重连过程有影响，特别是在太阳大气层和原行星盘中。碰撞改变了磁耗散加热的速率和位置，以及加速到非热尾部的粒子能量分布。在密切耦合碰撞的情况下，磁重连会快速发生，并形成磁岛，但很快会因为理想的撕裂不稳定性而崩溃。当进入碰撞解耦的阶段时，磁能会迅速转化为热能和带电粒子动能，导致太阳大气层和原行星盘中的局部加热和能量释放。这种解耦的快速磁重连可能导致太阳冕层中离子和电子的优先加热和能量激发，以及在原行星盘中产生红外原子和分子线发射。
Partially ionized plasmas consist of charged and neutral particles whose mutual collisions modify magnetic reconnection compared with the fully ionized case. The collisions alter the rate and locations of the magnetic dissipation heating and the distribution of energies among the particles accelerated into the nonthermal tail. We examine the collisional regimes for the onset of fast reconnection in two environments: the partially ionized layers of the solar atmosphere, and the protoplanetary disks that are the birthplaces for planets around young stars. In both these environments, magnetic nulls readily develop into resistive current sheets in the regime where the charged and neutral particles are fully coupled by collisions, but the current sheets quickly break down under the ideal tearing instability. The current sheets collapse repeatedly, forming magnetic islands at successively smaller scales, until they enter a collisionally decoupled regime where the magnetic energy is rapidly turned into heat and charged-particle kinetic energy. Small-scale, decoupled fast reconnection in the solar atmosphere may lead to preferential heating and energization of ions and electrons that escape into the corona. In protoplanetary disks such reconnection causes localized heating in the atmospheric layers that produce much of the infrared atomic and molecular line emission observed with the Spitzer and James Webb Space Telescopes.

item.title: Instability of Circumnuclear Gas Supply as an Origin of the “Changing-look” Phenomenon of Supermassive Black Holes
item.content:encoded:
超大质量黑洞，变化现象，活跃星系核，特征时间尺度，环核气体供应 研究旨在通过关注涵盖所有已知重复变化现象的活跃星系核样本，阐明“变化现象”现象的起源。通过鉴别“变化现象”的特征时间尺度，观察到较大的超大质量黑洞具有较短的特征时间尺度，而较小的超大质量黑洞表现出较长的时间尺度。这些发现揭示了“变化现象”与传统活跃星系核变化的显着对比，传统变化已被活跃星系核盘不稳定模型充分解释。这一鲜明的差异突出了“变化现象”的独特起源，将其区别于传统的活跃星系核变化。通过正确预测特征时间尺度及其对超大质量黑洞质量的依赖，我们提出“变化现象”很可能是由于在活跃和被动超大质量黑洞供油阶段过渡时，周围环核气体供应的突然变化导致的流量变化。

总结: 本研究通过观察活跃星系核样本，发现超大质量黑洞的变化现象存在特征时间尺度，且与传统变化不同。提出变化现象可能是由于活跃和被动超大质量黑洞供油阶段转换时，环核气体供应突然变化导致的流量变化。
The origin of the “changing-look” (CL) phenomenon in supermassive black holes (SMBHs) remains an open issue. This study aims to shed light on this phenomenon by focusing on a sample that encompasses all known repeating CL active galactic nuclei (AGNs). Through the identification of a characteristic timescale for the CL phenomenon, it was observed that larger SMBHs possess shorter characteristic timescales, while smaller SMBHs exhibit longer timescales. These findings reveal a significant contrast to the traditional AGN variability that has been adequately explained by the AGN’s disk instability model. This stark discrepancy highlights a distinct origin of the CL phenomenon, distinguishing it from traditional AGN variability. By properly predicting the characteristic timescale and its dependence on SMBH mass, we propose that the CL phenomenon is likely a result of a variation in accretion rate caused by a sudden change in the supply of circumnuclear gas during the transition between active and passive SMBH fueling stages.

item.title: Sensitive 3 mm Imaging of Discrete Sources in the Fields of Thermal Sunyaev–Zel’dovich Effect–Selected Galaxy Clusters
item.content:encoded:
tSZ, MUSTANG2, 90 GHz, Galaxy clusters, Source contamination 这篇论文报告了利用热Sunyaev–Zel'dovich效应（tSZ）在243个星系团中进行的盲目调查，使用Green Bank望远镜上的MUSTANG2在90 GHz进行了调查，将5σ检测限定为每个星系团中心的1 mJy。文章发现了24个离散源，其中大多数（18个）对应于已知的射电源，其中有五个显示出明显的变化迹象，要么是随时间变化，要么是频谱指数变化。其余的源在其他波长没有明确的对应物。通过tSZ强烈依赖于90 GHz的观测来搜索星系团，而发现的源可能会对星系团的质量估计产生偏差。文章将结果与Websky模拟进行了比较，发现模拟与观测在星系团中心的匹配良好，但在外围的源分布上不匹配。在距离星系团中心104″以上的源使tSZ信号偏高，部分源的偏差可高达50%。在整个星系团种群中平均后，效应较小，但仍在1%–2%的水平。文章还发现，与先前的测量和模拟不同，他们在星系团外围观察到了源计数的增加，而在tSZ选择的样本的中心观察到的源较少。

总结: tSZ观测在90 GHz进行了Galaxy clusters的盲目调查，发现了24个离散源，其中大多数对应已知的射电源，还比较了观测结果与模拟结果，在星系团的外围发现了源计数的增加并发现了一些源对tSZ信号的偏差。
In this paper, we present the results of a blind survey for compact sources in 243 Galaxy clusters that were identified using the thermal Sunyaev–Zel'dovich effect (tSZ). The survey was carried out at 90 GHz using MUSTANG2 on the Green Bank Telescope and achieved a 5σ detection limit of 1 mJy in the center of each cluster. We detected 24 discrete sources. The majority (18) of these correspond to known radio sources, and of these, five show signs of significant variability, either with time or in spectral index. The remaining sources have no clear counterparts at other wavelengths. Searches for galaxy clusters via the tSZ strongly rely on observations at 90 GHz, and the sources found have the potential to bias mass estimates of clusters. We compare our results to the Websky simulation that can be used to estimate the source contamination in galaxy cluster catalogs. While the simulation shows a good match to our observations at the clusters’ centers, it does not match our source distribution further out. Sources over 104″ from a cluster’s center bias the tSZ signal high, for some of the sources found, by over 50%. When averaged over the whole cluster population, the effect is smaller but still at a level of 1%–2%. We also discovered that unlike previous measurements and simulations, we see an enhancement of source counts in the outer regions of the clusters and fewer sources than expected in the centers of this tSZ-selected sample.

item.title: Structure and Kinematics of Star-forming Elliptical Galaxies in SDSS-MaNGA
item.content:encoded:
星系、椭圆星系、星的形成、光谱、形态图
通过空间分辨光谱学的研究，我们发现了一群罕见的具有星形成特征的椭圆星系。我们利用星际介质综合模型输出、深度学习目录的形态学结果以及MaNGA Pipe3D增值目录的解析和综合特性相结合，识别出了59个星形成椭圆星系。与我们的主要样本SF-E相比，我们还构建了两个控制样本：星形成螺旋星系（SF-Sps；2419个星系）和静止椭圆星系（Q-Es；684个星系）。SF-E的Hα发射线通量与螺旋星系相似，D4000光谱指数表明SF-E具有老年和年轻的恒星群。SF-E的质量加权恒星年龄和金属丰度低于Q-E，67%的主要样本的恒星和气体速度图显示出动力学扰动的迹象。所有这些结果表明，SF-E通过近期的合并或与其他星系的相互作用获得了贫金属气体，并且正在形成新一代的星。此外，我们还将主要样本的SF-E分为四类，根据它们的球状星系/总发光度比（B/T）和自旋参数。这四类具有各自独特的演化历史和形成方式。基于这些结果，我们建议哈勃图不能准确捕捉星系演化过程，我们需要一个修订的形态图，如梳形态图，才能完整地了解星系的演化过程。

总结: 通过空间分辨光谱学研究发现了59个星形成的椭圆星系，它们通过合并或与其他星系互动获取了贫金属气体，并产生了新一代的星。此外，作者还根据恒星年龄和金属丰度将这些星系分为四类，具有不同的演化历史和形成方式。作者建议需要一个修订的形态图来更好地理解星系演化过程。
Using “spatially” resolved spectroscopy, we investigated the characteristics and different modes of formation of stars in elliptical galaxies. We identified an unusual population of 59 star-forming elliptical (SF-E) galaxies in SDSS-MaNGA, our primary sample. To identify these rare star-forming ellipticals, we combined GSWLC-A2 containing outputs of stellar population synthesis models with morphological results from the deep-learning catalog and resolved and integrated properties from the MaNGA Pipe3D value-added catalog. We have also constructed two control samples of star-forming spirals (SF-Sps; 2419 galaxies) and quenched ellipticals (Q-Es; 684 galaxies) to compare with our primary sample of SF-Es. Hα emission line flux of SF-Es is similar to spiral galaxies. The D4000 spectral index indicates that SF-Es have a mixture of old and young stellar populations. Mass-weighted stellar age and metallicity for the SF-Es are lower than the Q-Es and 67% of stellar- and gas-velocity maps of the primary sample show signs of kinematic disturbance. All of these indicate that SF-Es have acquired metal-poor gas through recent mergers or interactions with other galaxies and are forming a new generation of stars. Further, we subdivide our primary sample of SF-Es into four classes based on their bulge to total luminosity ratio (B/T) and spin parameter . These four classes have their distinct evolutionary history and modes of formation. Based on these results, we suggest that the Hubble diagram does not accurately capture galaxy evolution processes, and we need a revised morphology diagram like the comb morphology diagram to get a complete picture of the galaxy evolution processes.

item.title: Near-infrared Spectroscopy for Remote Sensing of Porosity, Density, and Cubicity of Crystalline and Amorphous H2O Ices in Astrophysical Environments
item.content:encoded:
关键词: H2O ices, 近红外光谱, 空间冰, 光谱特征, 仪器曝光时间 总结:

这项研究利用实验室得到的纯非晶和晶态冰的近红外光谱，在80-180K温度范围内进行了研究。研究的目的是提供光谱参考数据，以便远程访问冰的性质，如冰卫星、彗星冰或土星环等冰的物质特性。研究特别识别了评估空间冰三个重要属性的新的光谱标记：(i) 孔隙度/蓬松度，(ii) 非晶冰的体密度，(iii) 结晶冰的立方性。研究分析了OH-伸展泛频（2νOH）和5000cm^{-1}/2μm的组合带，这些是这些属性的有力光谱标记。通过比较蒸发沉积的微孔非晶固态水、无孔低、高和非常高密度非晶冰的光谱，能够在非晶冰的近红外光谱中将(体)密度效应与孔隙度效应分离开来。这一点澄清了一直存在的问题，即詹尼斯肯斯和布莱克首次提出的低温蒸发沉积的非晶冰密度不一致问题。通过将近红外光谱与粉末X射线衍射图进行直接比较，可以将光谱特征与堆叠失序冰Isd中的立方叠层数相关联，范围从完全立方冰Ic到完全六角冰Ih。研究还表明，詹姆斯·韦伯空间望远镜上的仪器曝光时间在小时范围内可区分这些属性，证明了被忽视的近红外光谱范围对于识别空间中的冰是有用的。
We present laboratory spectra of pure amorphous and crystalline H2O ices in the near-infrared (NIR, 1–2.5 μm/10,000–4000 cm−1) at 80–180 K. The aim of this study is to provide spectroscopic reference data that allow remotely accessing ice properties for icy objects such as icy moons, cometary ice, or Saturn rings. Specifically, we identify new spectral markers for assessing three important properties of ices in space: (i) porosity/fluffiness, (ii) bulk density of amorphous ice, and (iii) cubicity in crystalline ice. The analysis is based on the first OH-stretching overtone (2νOH) and the combinational band at 5000 cm−1/2 μm, which are potent spectral markers for these properties. By comparison of vapor-deposited, microporous amorphous solid water, pore-free low-, high-, and very-high-density amorphous ice, we are able to separate the effect of (bulk) density from the effect of porosity on NIR-spectra of amorphous ices. This allows for clarifying a longstanding inconsistency about the density of amorphous ice vapor-deposited at low temperatures, first brought up by Jenniskens & Blake. Direct comparison of NIR spectra with powder X-ray diffractograms allows us to correlate spectral features with the number of cubic stacking layers in stacking-disordered ice Isd, ranging from fully cubic ice Ic to fully hexagonal ice Ih. We show that exposure times for instruments on the James Webb Space Telescope are in the hour range to distinguish these properties, demonstrating the usefulness of the neglected NIR spectral range for identifying ices in space.

item.title: The AstroSat UV Deep Field North: The IRX–β Relation for the UV-selected Galaxies at z ∼ 0.5−0.7
item.content:encoded:
关键词: UV continuum slope, infrared excess, high-redshift galaxies, dust attenuation law, SED modeling 总结:

这篇文章研究了通过观测的UV连续斜率（β）和红外过剩（IRX）之间的关系，来理解高红移星系的尘埃衰减规律。研究使用了来自AstroSat UV Deep Field北部的83个UV选择的星系数据，估算了52个星系的观测IRX。通过多波段光度数据进行SED建模，发现IRX-β值存在较大散布，表明尘埃衰减存在多样性。研究发现在IRX-β平面上最佳拟合的修正Calzetti关系的幂律斜率（δ）存在明显关联，SMC类似的更陡的衰减规律更偏好较低的δ值。SED模型的IRX-β关系显示偏好于更陡的SMC类似的衰减规律，这与用Hα发射线推导的星形成率和观测的远紫外加重处理的远红外辐射得出的结果吻合。这项研究揭示了IRX和星系的恒星质量之间的强正相关，表明更大质量的星系会产生更多的尘埃。
The relation between the observed UV continuum slope (β) and the infrared excess (IRX) is used as a powerful probe to understand the nature of dust attenuation law in high-redshift galaxies. We present a study of 83 UV-selected galaxies between a redshift of 0.5 and 0.7 from the AstroSat UV Deep Field north that encloses the GOODS-North field. Using empirical relation, we estimate the observed IRX of 52 galaxies that are detected in either one or both of the Herschel PACS 100 and 160 μm bands. We further utilize the multiband photometric data in 14–18 filters from the Ultra-Violet Imaging Telescope, KPNO, Hubble Space Telescope, Spitzer, and Herschel telescopes to perform spectral energy distribution (SED) modeling. Both the observed and model-derived IRX–β values show a large scatter within the span of previously known relations, signifying diversity in dust attenuation. We found a distinct relation between the best-fit power-law slope of the modified Calzetti relation (δ) in the IRX–β plane, where the steeper SMC-like attenuation law prefers lower δ values. Our SED model-based IRX–β relation shows a preference for steeper SMC-like attenuation, which we further confirm from the agreement between extinction-corrected star formation rates derived using the Hα emission line and the observed far-ultraviolet plus reprocessed far-IR fluxes. The current study reveals a strong positive correlation between IRX and the galaxy's stellar mass between 109.5 and 1011.0M⊙, signifying increased dust production in more massive star-forming galaxies.

item.title: Evidence of Continuous Reconnection along a Helmet Streamer Current Sheet Observed by WISPR on Parker Solar Probe
item.content:encoded:
Parker Solar Probe, solar encounter, magnetic structure, heliospheric current sheet, streamer blobs 总结: Parker Solar Probe于2019年3月30日至4月11日期间进行了第二次太阳遭遇，期间观测到了大量大小不一的流量增强体（流星团）在赤道附近流动。WISPR的高分辨率和灵敏度揭示了这些增强体的结构，显示出其中一些流星团具有暗色中心核心，暗示其为磁通绳。通过对四个典型流星团的3D轨迹和大小进行跟踪，确认它们的位置与太阳赤道帽相关联。这些流星团在15 R☉以上的区域被观测到，证实了在HCS附近的慢风中重新连接的过程主导着慢风的形成。

Parker Solar Probe's second solar encounter from 2019 March 30 to April 11 occurred during a period when the corona had a simple magnetic structure and relatively flat heliospheric current sheet (HCS), which was in the field of view of the Wide-field Imager for Solar Probe (WISPR) throughout. The images show an almost continual flow of transient density enhancements (streamer blobs) of various sizes near the latitude of the HCS during the entire 11 day encounter period. The high resolution and sensitivity of WISPR reveal the structure of some of the individual blobs not seen in observations from 1 au. Many of the blobs show dark central cores, suggesting that they are magnetic flux ropes. The 3D trajectories and sizes of four representative streamer blobs have been determined using the tracking and fitting technique of Liewer et al. (2020). Comparison of the location of these blobs with synoptic white-light maps for this time period, created using data from the Large Angle and Spectrometric Coronagraph (Brueckner et al. 1995) on board the Solar and Heliospheric Observatory, confirms that the blobs are at the location of the helmet streamer associated with the HCS. The blobs were observed in the region beyond 15 R☉. The continual flow of blobs, the confirmation of their location at the HCS, and their flux-rope-like appearance provide strong evidence that the process of reconnection across the current sheet dominates the slow wind near the HCS.

item.title: Discovery and Follow-up of a Quasiperiodically Nulling and Subpulse Drifting Pulsar with the Murchison Widefield Array
item.content:encoded: <div> PSR J0452−3418, pulsar, nulling, subpulse drifting, MWA survey 总结: 本文报道了来自南天MWA Rapid Two-meter脉冲星调查的长周期脉冲星PSR J0452−3418的发现。该脉冲星表现出准周期性的闪烁和亚脉冲漂移。文章描述了脉冲星的发现和后续跟踪，包括使用uGMRT进行高分辨率成像的位置测定，使用MWA和uGMRT数据进行初步定时分析，以及在MWA频段（140–170 MHz）内对闪烁和漂移特性的详细表征。研究发现，该脉冲星的闪烁分数为34% ± 6%，闪烁周期为脉冲。此外，文章还对比了观察到的特性与其他表现出亚脉冲漂移和准周期性闪烁现象的脉冲星的特征，并发现大多数这类对象倾向于处于“死亡谷”中。研究还讨论了脉冲星发射物理学的广泛含义以及使用下一代脉冲星调查方法检测类似对象的可行性。 <div> The phenomenon of pulsar nulling, where pulsars temporarily and stochastically cease their radio emission, is thought to be indicative of a “dying” pulsar, where radio emission ceases entirely. Here we report the discovery of a long-period pulsar, PSR J0452−3418, from the ongoing Southern-sky MWA Rapid Two-meter pulsar survey. The pulsar has a rotation period of ∼1.67 s and a dispersion measure of 19.8 pc cm−3, and it exhibits both quasiperiodic nulling and subpulse drifting. Periodic nulling is uncommon, reported in only <1% of the pulsar population, with even a smaller fraction showing periodic nulling and subpulse drifting. We describe the discovery and follow-up of the pulsar, including a positional determination using high-resolution imaging with the upgraded Giant Metrewave Radio Telescope (uGMRT), initial timing analysis using the combination of Murchison Widefield Array (MWA) and uGMRT data, and detailed characterization of the nulling and drifting properties in the MWA’s frequency band (140–170 MHz). Our analysis suggests a nulling fraction of 34% ± 6% and a nulling periodicity of pulses. We measure the phase (P2) and time modulation (P3) caused by the subpulse drifting, with an average P2 of 7.1 degrees and a P3 of 4.8 pulses. We compare and contrast the observed properties with those of other pulsars that exhibit subpulse drifting and quasiperiodic nulling phenomena, and find that the majority of these objects tend to be in the “death valley” in the period–period derivative (P– ) diagram. We also discuss some broader implications for pulsar emission physics and the detectability of similar objects using next-generation pulsar surveys.

item.title: Localizing Quasiperiodic Pulsations in Hard X-Ray, Microwave, and Lyα Emissions of an X6.4 Flare
item.content:encoded: <div> 关键词: 脉冲非定期脉动（QPPs），硬X射线（HXR），微波，Lyα，紫外线（UV） 总结: 脉冲非定期脉动（QPPs）在2024年2月22日（SOL2024-02-22T22:08）的X6.4耀斑的冲击阶段同时在硬X射线（HXR）、微波、Lyα和紫外线（UV）发射波长中观测到。X6.4耀斑在HXR和微波波段显示出三次重复和连续的脉动，并且具有极大的调制深度。耀斑QPPs的发生几乎与正负磁场的磁消除的开始几乎同时发生。小波功率谱表明存在两个中心在∼200和∼95秒左右的双周期。在耀斑区域还可以在Lyα和UV波段检测到长周期QPP，并且它可以在相邻的太阳黑子中观察到。我们的观测表明，耀斑QPPs很可能是由与周期性磁重连接相关的加速电子触发的。∼200秒的长周期可能受到来自邻近太阳黑子的慢磁声波的调制，而∼95秒的短周期可以被视为它的第二谐波模式。 <div> We report the simultaneous observations of quasiperiodic pulsations (QPPs) in wavelengths of hard X-ray (HXR), microwave, Lyα, and ultraviolet (UV) emissions during the impulsive phase of an X6.4 flare on 2024 February 22 (SOL2024-02-22T22:08). The X6.4 flare shows three repetitive and successive pulsations in HXR and microwave wavebands, and they have an extremely large modulation depth. The onset of flare QPPs is almost simultaneous with the start of magnetic cancellation between positive and negative fields. The wavelet power spectra suggest the presence of double periods, which are centered at ∼200 and ∼95 s, respectively. The long-period QPP can also be detected in Lyα and UV wavebands at the flare area, and it could be observed in the adjacent sunspot. Our observations indicate that the flare QPPs are most likely triggered by accelerated electrons that are associated with periodic magnetic reconnections. The long period at ∼200 s is probably modulated by the slow magnetoacoustic wave originating from the neighboring sunspot, while the short period at ∼95 s could be regarded as its second harmonic mode.

item.title: The Sun’s Magnetic Power Spectra over Two Solar Cycles. II. Cycle Dependence of Active Regions, a Magnetic Network, and Their Relation
item.content:encoded: The multiscaled solar magnetic field consists of two major components: active regions (ARs) and magnetic network. Unraveling the cycle-dependent properties and interrelations of these components is crucial for understanding the evolution of the solar magnetic field. In this study, we investigate these components using magnetic power spectra derived from high-resolution and continuous synoptic magnetograms since cycle 23 onward. Our results show that the size of the magnetic network ranges from 26 to 41 Mm without dependence on the solar cycle. The power of the network field (PNW) accounts for approximately 20% of the total power during any phase of solar cycles. In contrast to the AR power (PAR), PNW displays a weaker cycle dependence, as described by the relationship PNW ≈ 0.6* PAR + 40. The power-law index between AR sizes and magnetic network sizes presents a strong anticorrelation with the activity level. Additionally, our study indicates that in the absence of sunspots on the solar disc, the magnetic power spectra remain time-independent, consistently exhibiting similarity in both shape and power. This study introduces a new method to investigate the properties of the magnetic network and provides magnetic power spectra for high-resolution simulations of the solar magnetic field at the surface at various phases of solar cycles.

item.title: Carnegie Supernova Project I and II: Measurements of H 0 Using Cepheid, Tip of the Red Giant Branch, and Surface Brightness Fluctuation Distance Calibration to Type Ia Supernovae*
item.content:encoded:
<div> SNe Ia, Hubble constant, distance calibrators, near-infrared, systematic errors
总结: 本研究分析了Ia型超新星（SNe Ia）的数据，利用光学到近红外波段（uBgVriYJH）扩展了哈勃图。利用不同的距离校准器（Cepheids、TRGB和SBFs）计算了哈勃常数H0，得到了B波段的H0 = 71.76 ± 0.58（stat）± 1.19（sys）km s−1 Mpc−1和H波段的H0 = 73.22 ± 0.68（stat）± 1.28（sys）km s−1 Mpc−1。通过将Cepheid、TRGB和SBF校准器赋予相等的权重，得出了距离阶梯的第一层的系统误差约为1.2∼1.3 km s−1 Mpc−1，从而减小了我们的结果与宇宙微波背景提供的早期H0之间的张力。研究发现在Y波段有最高的SNe Ia发光精度（0.12 ± 0.01 mag）。另外，确认了SNe Ia的余辉主机质量相关性在光学和近红外波长间基本没有变化。最后，发现距离宿主中心超过10 kpc爆炸的SNe Ia发光分散较小，这可能是由于在主机外围灰尘的影响减小所导致的。 <div> We present an analysis of Type Ia supernovae (SNe Ia) from the Carnegie Supernova Project I and II and extend the Hubble diagram from optical to near-infrared wavelengths (uBgVriYJH). We calculate the Hubble constant, H0, using various distance calibrators: Cepheids, the tip of the red giant branch (TRGB), and surface brightness fluctuations (SBFs). Combining all methods of calibration, we derive H0 = 71.76 ± 0.58 (stat) ± 1.19 (sys) km s−1 Mpc−1 from the B band and H0 = 73.22 ± 0.68 (stat) ± 1.28 (sys) km s−1 Mpc−1 from the H band. By assigning equal weight to the Cepheid, TRGB, and SBF calibrators, we derive the systematic errors required for consistency in the first rung of the distance ladder, resulting in a systematic error of 1.2 ∼ 1.3 km s−1 Mpc−1 in H0. As a result, relative to the statistics-only uncertainty, the tension between the late-time H0 we derive by combining the various distance calibrators and the early-time H0 from the cosmic microwave background is reduced. The highest precision in SN Ia luminosity is found in the Y band (0.12 ± 0.01 mag), as defined by the intrinsic scatter (σint). We revisit SN Ia Hubble residual-host mass correlations and recover previous results that these correlations do not change significantly between the optical and near-infrared wavelengths. Finally, SNe Ia that explode beyond 10 kpc from their host centers exhibit smaller dispersion in their luminosity, confirming our earlier findings. A reduced effect of dust in the outskirts of hosts may be responsible for this effect.

item.title: Surface Brightness Fluctuations in Two SPT Clusters: A Pilot Study
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 表面亮度波动, SZ研究, X射线观测, 涡流特性, 星系团 总结: 本研究利用表面亮度波动来间接探测星系团介质中的湍流特性，包括湍流速度、注入尺度以及波动功率谱向较小尺度的倾斜。通过南极望远镜对SZ星系团的研究，结合X射线观测，选取了两个典型星系团进行了初步研究。研究结果显示，两个星系团中涡流的注入尺度都超过500千秒差距，其中SPT-CLJ0232-4421的马赫数约为0.5，SPT-CLJ0638-5358的马赫数约为0.6-1.6，并且后者有已知的激波。此外，对于M500，SPT-CLJ0232-4421的静压偏差值小于0.2，而SPT-CLJ0638-5358的静压偏差值小于0.1。这些结果表明，通过多波段的详细观测方法来定量评估数据的重要性，同时也暗示了湍流驱动可能出现在相当大的尺度上。

Studies of surface brightness fluctuations in the intracluster medium present an indirect probe of turbulent properties such as the turbulent velocities, injection scales, and the slope of the power spectrum of fluctuations toward smaller scales. With the advancement of Sunyaev–Zel’dovich (SZ) studies and surveys relative to X-ray observations, we seek to investigate surface brightness fluctuations in a sample of South Pole Telescope (SPT)-SZ clusters which also have archival XMM-Newton data. Here we present a pilot study of two typical clusters in that sample: SPT-CLJ0232-4421 and SPT-CLJ0638-5358. We infer injection scales larger than 500 kpc in both clusters and Mach numbers ≈ 0.5 in SPT-CLJ0232-4421 and Mach numbers ≈ 0.6–1.6 in SPT-CLJ0638-5358, which has a known shock. We find hydrostatic bias values for M500 less than 0.2 for SPT-CLJ0232-4421 and less than 0.1 for SPT-CLJ0638-5358. These results show the importance to assess quantitative values via a detailed multiwavelength approach and suggest that the drivers of turbulence may occur at quite large scales.

item.title: Are These Planets or Brown Dwarfs? Broadly Solar Compositions from High-resolution Atmospheric Retrievals of ∼10–30 M Jup Companions
item.content:encoded:
高分辨率光谱，年轻次恒星伴星，大气检索，金属丰度，碳氧比率

这项研究使用Keck行星成像仪和特性分析仪进行了高分辨率光谱观测，对八个质量约为10-30倍木星质量、轨道分离约50-360天文单位、有效温度约在1500-2600K之间的年轻次恒星伴星进行了统一的大气检索。研究发现所有伴星的碳氧比率和金属丰度均接近太阳值，且与太阳系中恒星的大气成分相似。这表示这些伴星的形成可能与直接的重力坍缩过程相关。与m < 10倍木星质量的直接成像行星大气金属丰度略有不同。另外，我们还对三个信噪比最高的伴星进行了12CO/13CO比值的限制，对所有伴星进行了径向速度的测量。具体模型预测，尤其是针对Teff约在1700-2000K的伴星κ And b和GSC 6214-210 b，偏好于有云模型，这与热木星的大气成分有所不同。

总结: 该研究使用Keck行星成像仪和特性分析仪进行了高分辨率光谱观测，发现年轻次恒星伴星的大气成分与太阳系中的恒星相似，可能与直接的重力坍缩过程相关。与小质量直接成像行星的大气金属丰度略有不同，同时也与热木星的大气成分有所不同。
Using Keck Planet Imager and Characterizer high-resolution (R ∼ 35,000) spectroscopy from 2.29 to 2.49 μm, we present uniform atmospheric retrievals for eight young substellar companions with masses of ∼10–30 MJup, orbital separations spanning ∼50–360 au, and Teff between ∼1500 and 2600 K. We find that all companions have solar C/O ratios and metallicities to within the 1σ–2σ level, with the measurements clustered around solar composition. Stars in the same stellar associations as our systems have near-solar abundances, so these results indicate that this population of companions is consistent with formation via direct gravitational collapse. Alternatively, core accretion outside the CO snowline would be compatible with our measurements, though the high mass ratios of most systems would require rapid core assembly and gas accretion in massive disks. On a population level, our findings can be contrasted with abundance measurements for directly imaged planets with m < 10 MJup, which show tentative atmospheric metal enrichment compared to their host stars. In addition, the atmospheric compositions of our sample of companions are distinct from those of hot Jupiters, which most likely form via core accretion. For two companions with Teff ∼ 1700–2000 K (κ And b and GSC 6214–210 b), our best-fit models prefer a nongray cloud model with >3σ significance. The cloudy models yield 2σ−3σ lower Teff for these companions, though the C/O and [C/H] still agree between cloudy and clear models at the 1σ level. Finally, we constrain 12CO/13CO for three companions with the highest signal-to-noise ratio data (GQ Lup b, HIP 79098b, and DH Tau b) and report and radial velocities for all companions.

item.title: Figuring Out Gas and Galaxies in Enzo (FOGGIE). VII. The (Dis)assembly of Stellar Halos
item.content:encoded:
高分辨率模拟，星周的性质，FOGGIE模拟，宽景天文台，恒星晕
总结:
本文使用了高分辨率的宇宙学模拟来研究恒星晕的性质和组成成分，模拟结果表明FOGGIE模拟的恒星晕质量、金属丰度梯度和表面亮度分布与观测一致。恒星晕中有30%-40%的质量来源于原位恒星，这部分恒星更为集中在中心区域，不会使恒星晕外围过亮。剩下的恒星主要来自于10-50个其他星系，其中大部分来自于2-4个星系。预计未来的宽景天文台，如南希·格雷斯·罗曼太空望远镜，将能够观测到银河系附近的恒星晕，甚至可以通过色-星等图来区分矮星系的残骸与恒星晕的区别。
Over the next decade, the astronomical community will be commissioning multiple wide-field observatories well suited for studying stellar halos in both integrated light and resolved stars. In preparation for this, we use five high-resolution cosmological simulations of Milky Way–like galaxies from the FOGGIE suite to explore the properties and components of stellar halos. These simulations are run with high time (5 Myr) and stellar mass (1000 M⊙) resolution to better model the properties and origins of low-density regions like stellar halos. We find that the FOGGIE stellar halos have masses, metallicity gradients, and surface brightness profiles that are consistent with observations. In agreement with other simulations, the FOGGIE stellar halos receive 30%–40% of their mass from in situ stars. However, this population is more centrally concentrated in the FOGGIE simulations and therefore does not contribute excess light to the halo outskirts. The remaining stars are accreted from ∼10–50 other galaxies, with the majority of the accreted mass originating in two to four galaxies. While the inner halo (r < 50 kpc) of each FOGGIE galaxy has a large number of contributors, the halo outskirts of three of the five galaxies are primarily made up of stars from only a few contributors. We predict that upcoming wide-field observatories, like the Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope, will probe stellar halos around Milky Way–like galaxies out to ∼100 kpc in integrated light and will be able to distinguish the debris of dwarf galaxies with extended star formation histories from the underlying halo with resolved color–magnitude diagrams.

item.title: Efficient NIRCam Selection of Quiescent Galaxies at 3 < z < 6 in CEERS
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: massive quiescent galaxies, z ≥ 3, JWST NIRCam imaging data, color selection technique, SED fitting
总结: 本研究提出了一种新的经验性颜色选择技术，旨在利用JWST NIRCam成像数据在3≤z≤6的范围内选择大质量寂静星系。通过使用经验约束的星系光谱能量分布（SED）模板，确定了F277W-F444W与F150W-F277W色彩平面上的一个区域，捕捉了z>3的寂静星系。在CEERS调查中应用这些颜色选择标准，并对该区域内的源进行SED拟合，鉴定出了44个z≳3的寂静星系候选体。其中超过一半的源是新发现的，平均具有后爆发星系的特定星形成率。大多数这些源在传统UVJ图中是无法发现的。我们估算出3<5时的体密度为n∼1-4×10^-5 Mpc^-3，与CEERS领域类似群体的现有报告非常一致。借助NIRCam的波长覆盖范围和灵敏度，这种技术提供了一种高效的工具，可以搜索到大量这种罕见的星系。 <div> Substantial populations of massive quiescent galaxies at z ≥ 3 challenge our understanding of rapid galaxy growth and quenching over short timescales. In order to piece together this evolutionary puzzle, more statistical samples of these objects are required. Established techniques for identifying massive quiescent galaxies are increasingly inefficient and unconstrained at z > 3. As a result, studies report that as much as 70% of quiescent galaxies at z > 3 may be missed from existing surveys. In this work, we propose a new empirical color selection technique designed to select massive quiescent galaxies at 3 ≲ z ≲ 6 using JWST NIRCam imaging data. We use empirically constrained galaxy spectral energy distribution (SED) templates to define a region in the F277W − F444W versus F150W − F277W color plane that captures quiescent galaxies at z > 3. We apply these color selection criteria to the Cosmic Evolution Early Release Science (CEERS) Survey and use SED fitting on sources in the region to identify 44 candidate z ≳ 3 quiescent galaxies. Over half of these sources are newly discovered and, on average, exhibit specific star formation rates of poststarburst galaxies. Most of these sources would not be discovered using canonical UVJ diagrams. We derive volume density estimates of n ∼ 1–4 × 10−5 Mpc−3 at 3 < z < 5, finding excellent agreement with existing reports on similar populations in the CEERS field. Thanks to NIRCam’s wavelength coverage and sensitivity, this technique provides an efficient tool to search for large samples of these rare galaxies.

item.title: A Study of the Spectral Properties of Gamma-Ray Bursts with the Precursors and Main Bursts
item.content:encoded: <div> 关键词: gamma-ray bursts, spectral analysis, outflow properties, Amati relation, Yonetoku relation 总结: gamma-ray bursts 研究者对21个Fermi GRBs进行了系统的分析，发现几乎所有的precursors和主爆发都表现出热组分，并且它们的能谱指数存在相关演化。此外，他们也发现大部分的情况下precursors和主爆发有着类似的发射特性和光谱特征，并且它们在Amati关系和Yonetoku关系中处于相似的分布区域。因此，研究结论认为主爆发是precursors的延续，可能有着共同的物理起源。 <div> There is no consensus yet on whether the precursor and the main burst of gamma-ray bursts (GRBs) have the same origin, and their jet composition is still unclear. In order to further investigate this issue, we systematically search 21 Fermi GRBs with both a precursor and main burst for spectral analysis. We first perform Bayesian time-resolved spectral analysis and find that almost all the precursors and the main bursts (94.4%) exhibit thermal components and that the vast majority of them have a low-energy spectral index (α; 72.2%) that exceeds the limit of synchrotron radiation. We then analyze the evolution and correlation of the spectral parameters and find that approximately half of the α (50%) of the precursors and the main bursts evolve in a similar pattern, while peak energy (Ep; 55.6%) behaves similarly, and their evolution is mainly characterized by flux tracking; for the α−F (the flux) relation, more than half of the precursors and the main bursts (61.1%) exhibit roughly similar patterns; the Ep−F relation in both the precursor and main burst (100%) exhibits a positive correlation of at least moderate strength. Next, we constrain the outflow properties of the precursors and the main bursts and find that most of them exhibit typical properties of photosphere radiation. Finally, we compare the time-integrated spectra of the precursors and the main bursts and find that nearly all of them are located in similar regions of the Amati relation and follow the Yonetoku relation. Therefore, we conclude that main bursts are continuations of precursors and may share a common physical origin.

item.title: Unveiling the True Nature of Plasma Dynamics from the Reference Frame of a Superpenumbral Fibril
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 磁场几何, 太阳大气, 波传播, 纤维结构, 振荡 总结:

这篇文章主要介绍了太阳大气中的磁场几何以及投影效应对波的传播路径进行精确映射的困难。研究人员利用Dunn太阳望远镜的干涉双向光谱仪，对一个太阳黑子进行了高分辨率的Hα光谱扫描，并对一个突出的超边暗纤维的横向振荡进行了深入研究。他们发现这个纤维在椭圆偏振下进行传播的扭曲振荡，振荡周期为430秒，相速度为69±4 km/s。随着振荡传播离开太阳黑子，能量逐渐耗散，导致能量流量呈现约460 W m-2/Mm的速率减小。另外，研究还发现Hα线宽随着距离太阳黑子的增加而增加，可能是温度的迹象。虽然研究了不同线性和非线性机制对波能量流的耗散，但它们的简单叠加效果无法解释观察到的耗散长度。研究人员预计，本文展示的重投影方法将有助于未来对纤维结构中横向波的研究。
The magnetic geometry of the solar atmosphere, combined with projection effects, makes it difficult to accurately map the propagation of ubiquitous waves in fibrillar structures. These waves are of interest due to their ability to carry energy into the chromosphere and deposit it through damping and dissipation mechanisms. To this end, the Interferometric Bidimensional Spectrometer at the Dunn Solar Telescope was employed to capture high-resolution Hα spectral scans of a sunspot, with the transverse oscillations of a prominent superpenumbral fibril examined in depth. The oscillations are reprojected from the helioprojective Cartesian frame to a new frame of reference oriented along the average fibril axis through nonlinear force-free field extrapolations. The fibril was found to be carrying an elliptically polarized, propagating kink oscillation with a period of 430 s and a phase velocity of 69 ± 4 km s−1. The oscillation is damped as it propagates away from the sunspot with a damping length of approximately 9.2 Mm, resulting in the energy flux decreasing at a rate on the order of 460 W m−2/Mm. The Hα line width is examined and found to increase with distance from the sunspot, a potential sign of a temperature increase. Different linear and nonlinear mechanisms are investigated for the damping of the wave energy flux, but a first-order approximation of their combined effects is insufficient to recreate the observed damping length by a factor of at least 3. It is anticipated that the reprojection methodology demonstrated in this study will aid with future studies of transverse waves within fibrillar structures.

item.title: A Hot Core in the Group-dominant Elliptical Galaxy NGC 777
item.content:encoded:
NGC 777, 热核, Chandra X射线, 恒星系核, 辐射天体
总结:
NGC 777是一个椭圆星系核的研究对象，其温度分布与辐射天体活动关联紧密。通过深度的Chandra X射线观测和uGMRT 400 MHz的射电成像，研究发现其核区存在热核现象，同时发现周围存在微弱的射电辐射。通过观测结果推测，该热核可能是由于活动星系核喷流作用或者来自老的射电喷流残留的粒子加热导致。同时，通过X射线亮度的减小，可以说明可能存在喷流在10-20kpc范围内的扩展，此喷流可能已经持续至少240百万年，可以平衡辐射冷却效应。
NGC 777 provides an example of a phenomenon observed in some group-central ellipticals, in which the temperature profile shows a central peak, despite the short central cooling time of the intragroup medium. We use deep Chandra X-ray observations of the galaxy, supported by uGMRT 400 MHz radio imaging, to investigate the origin of this hot core. We confirm the centrally peaked temperature profile and find that the entropy and cooling time both monotonically decline to low values (2.62 keV cm2 and Myr, respectively) in the central ∼700 pc. Faint diffuse radio emission surrounds the nuclear point source, with no clear jets or lobes but extending to ∼10 kpc on the northwest–southeast axis. This alignment and extent agree well with a previously identified filamentary Hα + [N ii] nebula. While cavities are not firmly detected, we see X-ray surface brightness decrements on the same axis at 10–20 kpc radii, which are consistent with the intragroup medium having been pushed aside by expanding radio lobes. Any such outburst must have occurred long enough ago for lobe emission to have faded below detectability. Cavities on this scale would be capable of balancing radiative cooling for at least ∼240 Myr. We consider possible causes of the centrally peaked temperature profile, including gravitational heating of gas as the halo relaxes after a period of active galactic nucleus jet activity, and heating by particles leaking from the remnant relativistic plasma of the old radio jets.

item.title: Age of Massive Galaxies at Redshift 8
item.content:encoded:
高红移星系, 红外观测, 星际物质, 宇宙学, 恒星形成

这篇文章分析了最近詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜的数据，并发现了红移z≳6时存在大质量红色星系，这与标准宇宙学模型（ΛCDM）难以理解。研究使用恒星群体模型拟合光学和红外光度数据，发现这些星系的平均年龄大约在0.9到2.4亿年之间，与标准宇宙模型的预期不符。结果可能表明需要考虑非标准的宇宙学模型。但需要进一步研究来证实观测到的红移高于ΛCDM宇宙学的星系的存在。

总结: 高红移星系的存在挑战了标准宇宙学模型，可能需要非标准宇宙学模型来解释。必须进行进一步研究以验证这一发现。
Recent James Webb Space Telescope data analyses have shown that massive red galaxies existed at redshifts z ≳ 6, a discovery that is difficult to understand in the context of standard cosmology (ΛCDM). Here, we analyze these observations more deeply, by fitting a stellar population model to the optical and near-infrared photometric data. These fits include a main stellar population in addition to a residual younger population and with the same extinction for both (a lower extinction for the younger population is unphysical). Extra stellar populations or the inclusion of an active galactic nucleus component do not significantly improve the fits. These galaxies are being viewed at very high redshifts, with an average 〈z〉 ≈ 8.2, when the ΛCDM Universe was only ≈600 Myr old. This result conflicts with the inferred ages of these galaxies, however, which were on average between 0.9 and 2.4 Gyr old within a 95% confidence level. Given the sequence of star formation and galaxy assembly in the standard model, these galaxies should instead be even younger than 290 Myr on average, for which our analysis assigns a probability of only <3 × 10−4 (≳3.6σ tension). This outcome may indicate the need to consider nonstandard cosmologies. Nevertheless, our conclusions result from several approximations in stellar astrophysics and extinction, so they should be taken with a grain of salt. Further research is necessary to corroborate the possible existence of galaxies older than the ΛCDM Universe at their observed redshifts.

item.title: Atmospheric Waves Driving Variability and Cloud Modulation on a Planetary-mass Object
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 行星质量物体, 棕矮星, 光度变化, 近红外光度计, 大气波动

总结:
这篇文章讨论了在行星质量物体和棕矮星处于L/T过渡阶段时光度的变化情况，研究发现主要是由于大气波动导致的。通过多波段的近红外光度计测量了SIMP0136的光度变化，发现波动模型更适用于所有四个波段。此外，还发现了H − K和J − H颜色时间序列之间存在93.°8 ± 7.°4的相位差，表明SIMP0136的大气结构复杂。通过相关颜色变化的分析和模型验证，得出了波动引起的云的变化和破裂，类似于木星的大气情况。
Planetary-mass objects and brown dwarfs at the transition (Teff ∼ 1300 K) from relatively red L dwarfs to bluer mid-T dwarfs show enhanced spectrophotometric variability. Multiepoch observations support atmospheric planetary-scale (Kelvin or Rossby) waves as the primary source of this variability; however, large spots associated with the precipitation of silicate and metal clouds have also been theorized and suggested by Doppler imaging. We applied both wave and spotted models to fit near-infrared (NIR), multiband (Y/J/H/K) photometry of SIMP J013656.5+093347 (hereafter SIMP0136) collected at the Canada–France–Hawaii Telescope using the Wide-field InfraRed Camera. SIMP0136 is a planetary-mass object (12.7 ± 1.0 MJ) at the L/T transition (T2 ± 0.5) known to exhibit light-curve evolution over multiple rotational periods. We measure the maximum peak-to-peak variability of 6.17% ± 0.46%, 6.45% ± 0.33%, 6.51% ± 0.42%, and 4.33% ± 0.38% in the Y, J, H, and K bands, respectively, and find evidence that wave models are preferred for all four NIR bands. Furthermore, we determine that the spot size necessary to reproduce the observed variations is larger than the Rossby deformation radius and Rhines scale, which is unphysical. Through the correlation between light curves produced by the waves and associated color variability, we find evidence of planetary-scale, wave-induced cloud modulation and breakup, similar to Jupiter’s atmosphere and supported by general circulation models. We also detect a 93.°8 ± 7.°4 (12.7σ) phase shift between the H − K and J − H color time series, providing evidence for complex vertical cloud structure in SIMP0136's atmosphere.

item.title: CEERS: 7.7 μm PAH Star Formation Rate Calibration with JWST MIRI
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: UV-derived star formation rates, 7.7 μm polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon luminosities, SED modeling, JWST/MIRI, galaxies at z ∼ 0–2
总结: 本研究测试了恒星形成率（SFRs）与7.7微米多环芳烃发光在z∼0–2星系中的关系。通过利用来自哈勃太空望远镜、CFHT、JWST、Spitzer和Herschel的多波段光度测量数据，对CEERS调查中的星系进行了谱能分布（SED）建模。研究测量了经过尘埃校正的远紫外线（FUV）光度LFUV和UV导出的SFR。然后使用JWST/MIRI 7.7-21微米数据对SED模型进行拟合，得到了其余波段7.7微米光度L770。研究发现L770与LFUV之间存在相关性。对于低金属含量、较低尘埃遮挡和受到演化恒星群体主导的星系，L770与这一关系有所偏离。研究得出了L770的“单波长”SFR校准，其与模型估计的SFRs的离散度（σΔSFR）为0.24 dex。此外，还得出了FUV光度（未经尘埃校正）和余波段7.7微米光度的线性组合的“多波段”校准，其离散度σΔSFR = 0.21 dex。这些结果表明，JWST/MIRI约束的余波段7.7微米发射对于远处星系的SFR是一个可靠的追踪器，其精度为0.21-0.24 dex，前提是星系以中等到高水平的遮挡和金属含量主导星形成。 <div> We test the relationship between UV-derived star formation rates (SFRs) and the 7.7 μm polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon luminosities from the integrated emission of galaxies at z ∼ 0–2. We utilize multiband photometry covering 0.2–160 μm from the Hubble Space Telescope, CFHT, JWST, Spitzer, and Herschel for galaxies in the Cosmic Evolution Early Release Science (CEERS) Survey. We perform spectral energy distribution (SED) modeling of these data to measure dust-corrected far-UV (FUV) luminosities, LFUV, and UV-derived SFRs. We then fit SED models to the JWST/MIRI 7.7–21 μm CEERS data to derive rest-frame 7.7 μm luminosities, L770, using the average flux density in the rest-frame MIRI F770W bandpass. We observe a correlation between L770 and LFUV, where . L770 diverges from this relation for galaxies at lower metallicities, lower dust obscuration, and for galaxies dominated by evolved stellar populations. We derive a “single-wavelength” SFR calibration for L770 that has a scatter from model estimated SFRs (σΔSFR) of 0.24 dex. We derive a “multiwavelength” calibration for the linear combination of the observed FUV luminosity (uncorrected for dust) and the rest-frame 7.7 μm luminosity, which has a scatter of σΔSFR = 0.21 dex. The relatively small decrease in σ suggests this is near the systematic accuracy of the total SFRs using either calibration. These results demonstrate that the rest-frame 7.7 μm emission constrained by JWST/MIRI is a tracer of the SFR for distant galaxies to this accuracy, provided the galaxies are dominated by star formation with moderate-to-high levels of attenuation and metallicity.

item.title: A Protocluster of Massive Quiescent Galaxies at z = 4
item.content:encoded: We report on discovery of a concentration of massive quiescent galaxies located at z = 4. The concentration is first identified using high-quality photometric redshifts based on deep, multiband data in Subaru/XMM-Newton Deep Field. Follow-up near-infrared spectroscopic observations with MOSFIRE on Keck confirm a massive (∼1011M⊙) quiescent galaxy at z = 3.99. Our spectral energy distribution analyses reveal that the galaxy experienced an episode of starburst about 500 Myr prior to the observed epoch, followed by rapid quenching. Since its spectrum is sufficiently good to measure the stellar velocity dispersion, we infer its dynamical mass and find that it is consistent with its stellar mass. The galaxy is surrounded by four massive (>1010M⊙) quiescent galaxies on a ∼1 physical Mpc scale, all of which are consistent with being located at the same redshift based on high-accuracy spectrophotometric redshifts. This is likely a (proto)cluster dominated by quiescent galaxies, the first of the kind reported at such a high redshift as z = 4. Interestingly, it is in a large-scale structure revealed by spectroscopic redshifts from VANDELS. Furthermore, it also exhibits a red sequence, adding further support to the physical concentration of the galaxies. We find no such concentration in the Illustris-TNG300 simulation; it may be that the cluster is such a rare system that the simulation box is not sufficiently large to reproduce it. The total halo mass of the quiescent galaxies is ∼1013M⊙, suggesting that they form a group-sized halo once they collapse together. We discuss the implications of our findings for the quenching physics and conclude with future prospects.

item.title: Modeling the Propagation of Slow Magnetoacoustic Waves in a Multistranded Coronal Loop
item.content:encoded: We study the propagation properties of slow magnetoacoustic waves in a multithermal coronal loop using a 3D MHD model, for the first time. A bundle of 33 vertical cylinders, each of 100 km radius, randomly distributed over a circular region of radius 1 Mm, is considered to represent the coronal loop. The slow waves are driven by perturbing the vertical velocity (vz) at the base of the loop. We apply forward modeling to the simulation results to generate synthetic images in the coronal channels of the Solar Dynamics Observatory/Atmospheric Imaging Assembly. Furthermore, we add appropriate data noise to enable direct comparison with the real observations. It is found that the synthetic images at the instrument resolution show noncospatial features in different temperature channels in agreement with previous observations. Time–distance maps are constructed from the synthetic data to study the propagation properties. The results indicate that the oscillations are only visible in specific channels, depending on the temperature range of the plasma existing within the loop. Additionally, the propagation speed of slow waves is also found to be sensitive to the available temperature range. Overall, we propose that the cross-field thermal properties of coronal structures can be inferred using a combination of numerical simulations and observations of slow magnetoacoustic waves.

item.title: Radio Emission from the Magnetically Active M Dwarf UV Ceti from 1 to 105 GHz
item.content:encoded: <div> UV Ceti, radio spectrum, magnetic field, nonthermal particle acceleration, dynamo processes 总结: UV Ceti是一个近邻（2.7 pc）的双星系统，其大规模磁场导致其与BL Ceti有非常不同的磁活动特征。文章通过对UV Ceti的射电频谱进行多时期的观测，并展示了类似太阳冕层活动的耀斑辐射、类似行星磁层的极光辐射，以及缓慢变化的持续辐射。射电观测是探究UV Ceti大规模磁场在非热粒子加速中的作用的有效手段。观测结果显示所有波段均存在时间变化，并且在40 GHz以下存在循环偏振度的旋转调制迹象。持续辐射在1到105 GHz范围内基本稳定，排除了来自各向同性螺旋角分布的电子的光厚辐射或光薄吉罗同步辐射机制。文章讨论了类似于木星辐射带的辐射机制可能性。 <div> BL and UV Ceti are a nearby (2.7 pc) binary system with similar masses, spectral types, and rapid rotation rates, but very different magnetic activity. UV Ceti’s much stronger large-scale magnetic field may cause this difference, highlighting key unanswered questions about dynamo processes in fully convective objects. Here, we present multiepoch characterization of the radio spectrum of UV Ceti spanning 1–105 GHz, exhibiting flared emission similar to coronal activity, auroral-like emission analogous to planetary magnetospheres, and slowly varying persistent emission. Radio observations are a powerful means to probe the role that the large-scale magnetic field of UV Ceti has in nonthermal particle acceleration because radio-frequency phenomena result from both the activity of small-scale field features as well as large-scale auroral current systems. We find temporal variability at all bands observed, and a hint of rotational modulation in the degree of circular polarization up to 40 GHz. The persistent component of the emission is fairly constant from 1 to 105 GHz, making optically thick emission or optically thin gyrosynchrotron from electrons with an isotropic pitch angle distribution unlikely. We discuss the possibility of emission mechanisms analogous to Jupiter’s radiation belts.

item.title: Mixing of Hot Shocked Plasma with Cold Gas in Nova YZ Ret 2020
item.content:encoded:
X-ray grating spectra, classical nova, YZ Ret, collisionally ionized plasma, radiative recombination continua

该研究对YZ Ret古典新星进行了研究，发现在喷发后77天和115天分别观测到了两个高分辨率的X射线光栅谱。这两个谱中均显示出蓝移速度为-1500 km s-1的发射线，其宽度为500 km s-1。研究结果表明，这两个谱均可以被约70eV的碰撞电离等离子体所描述，并且在两次观测之间减弱了约40倍。此外，谱中还观测到了C+4、C+5和N+5的窄辐射复合连续谱，表明热离子化等离子体与约2eV的冷电子发生相互作用。研究还发现C+4的高n-Rydberg系列异常明亮，可通过连续谱降低来测量电子密度，这与He样N+5的密度诊断结果相吻合。研究认为这些高n能级的高密度是迄今为止在天体物理离子化等离子体中发生带中子氢的最好证据。此外，尽管密度高且通量减少，但令人惊讶的是，在38天后速度和等离子体温度仍然相同，这是持续加热的证据。研究提出这种加热是由于新星喷射物中的反冲冲击产生了一个薄的X射线壳。窄的辐射复合连续谱和带中子氢的反应被归因于与冷气体的直接混合，它们从冲击波前或通过接触不连续面超越了热等离子体。

总结: 该研究对新星YZ Ret进行了X射线谱的观测，发现了碰撞电离等离子体的特征，以及与冷电子和中子氢的互动，揭示了新星喷发后的物理过程。
The origin of bright X-ray emission lines that appear late in a nova eruption remains largely a puzzle. We present two high-resolution X-ray grating spectra of the classical nova YZ Ret, observed 77 and 115 days post-eruption, using XMM-Newton and Chandra, respectively. Both spectra feature resolved emission lines blueshifted by v = –1500 km s−1 and broadened by σv = 500 km s−1. The two spectra are well described by a collisionally ionized plasma of kT ∼ 70 eV that dimmed by a factor of ∼40 between the two exposures. The spectra also show narrow radiative recombination continua (RRCs) of C+4, C+5, and N+5, indicating the interaction of the hot ionized plasma with cold electrons of kT ∼ 2 eV. The high-n Rydberg series of C+4 is anomalously bright, allowing us to measure the electron density through continuum lowering, which is in agreement with the He-like N+5 density diagnostic of ne = (1.7 ± 0.4) × 1011 cm−3. The high population of these high-n levels constitutes the best evidence to date of charge exchange (CX) with neutral H in an astrophysical ionized plasma. The remarkable fact that the velocity and plasma temperature are the same after 38 days, despite the high density and decreasing flux, is evidence for ongoing heating. We suggest the heating is due to a reverse shock in the nova ejecta, which forms a thin X-ray shell. The narrow RRCs and CX are attributed to direct mixing with cold gas, which overtakes the hot plasma either from the shock front or through the contact discontinuity.

item.title: A Model for Pair Production Limit Cycles in Pulsar Magnetospheres
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 电场振荡, e±对产生, 脉冲星, 界面模型, 磁层电流
总结: 本文提出了关于脉冲星的电场振荡源自自相干e±对产生的假设，并通过粒子-网格模拟展示了对此过程的电场屏蔽效应。接着，作者通过发展一个简化的时间演化动力学模型来再现e±对产生和电场屏蔽的极限循环行为。该模型考虑了磁层电流的影响、e±的逃逸以及产生率对等离子体密度和能量的动态依赖。最后，通过这一简单的理论模型，作者展示了电场振荡的功率谱在多个极限循环中的平均值与观测到的脉冲星无线电谱是一致的。 <div> It was recently proposed that the electric field oscillation as a result of self-consistent e± pair production may be the source of coherent radio emission from pulsars. Direct particle-in-cell simulations of this process have shown that the screening of the parallel electric field by this pair cascade manifests as a limit cycle, as the parallel electric field is recurrently induced when pairs produced in the cascade escape from the gap region. In this work, we develop a simplified time-dependent kinetic model of e± pair cascades in pulsar magnetospheres that can reproduce the limit-cycle behavior of pair production and electric field screening. This model includes the effects of a magnetospheric current, the escape of e±, as well as the dynamic dependence of pair production rate on the plasma density and energy. Using this simple theoretical model, we show that the power spectrum of electric field oscillations averaged over many limit cycles is compatible with the observed pulsar radio spectrum.

item.title: Solar Flare Ribbon Fronts. II. Evolution of Heating Rates in Individual Flare Footpoints
item.content:encoded:
Solar flare, ribbon fronts, chromosphere, nonthermal electrons, numerical experiments
太阳耀斑，丝带前缘，色球层，非热电子，数值实验

总结: 太阳耀斑中的丝带前缘是耀斑能量沉积到色球层的初始迹象，具有较长的持续时间。研究表明，在注入非热电子能通量很低的情况下，丝带前缘的特性会持续更长时间。在色球层变得足够炽热和密集时，丝带前缘会转变为常规明亮的丝带。因此，丝带前缘的持续时间是衡量相对较低能通量的高能电子在耀斑能通量较大的轰击之前沉积到色球层的持续时间。
Solar flare ribbon fronts appear ahead of the bright structures that normally characterize solar flares, and can persist for an extended period of time in spatially localized patches before transitioning to “regular” bright ribbons. They likely represent the initial onset of flare energy deposition into the chromosphere. Chromospheric spectra (e.g., He i 10830 Å and the Mg ii near-UV lines) from ribbon fronts exhibit properties rather different to typical flare behavior. In prior numerical modeling efforts we were unable to reproduce the long lifetime of ribbon fronts. Here we present a series of numerical experiments that are rather simple but which have important implications. We inject a very low flux of nonthermal electrons (F = 5 × 108 erg s−1 cm−2) into the chromosphere for 100 s before ramping up to standard flare energy fluxes (F = 1010−11 erg s−1 cm−2). Synthetic spectra not only sustained their ribbon-front-like properties for significantly longer: in the case of harder nonthermal electron spectra, the ribbon front behavior persisted for the entirety of this weak-heating phase. Lengthening or shortening the duration of the weak-heating phase commensurately lengthened or shortened the ribbon front lifetimes. Ribbon fronts transitioned to regular bright ribbons when the upper chromosphere became sufficiently hot and dense, which happened faster for softer nonthermal electron spectra. Thus, the lifetime of flare ribbon fronts are a direct measure of the duration over which a relatively low flux of high-energy electrons precipitates to the chromosphere prior to the bombardment of a much larger energy flux.

item.title: Carbon Isotope Fractionation of Complex Organic Molecules in Star-forming Cores
item.content:encoded:
Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array, carbon isotope ratios, complex organic molecules, gas-grain chemical network model, 12C/13C ratios bimodal in prestellar phase
12C/13C同位素比率的研究揭示了低质量原恒星源中复杂有机分子的12C/13C比值。研究通过气粒化学网络模型探讨了COMs的C同位素分馏，确认了在幼年恒星形成过程中，小分子的12C/13C比率在预恒星阶段呈双峰分布，而COMs的产生方式将影响其同位素比率。通过引入直接C原子添加反应，减轻了COMs的13C耗尽，并更好地复制了观测结果。此外，还讨论了宇宙射线电离率对COMs的12C/13C比率的影响。

总结: 这项研究通过Atacama大型毫米/亚毫米阵列观测，揭示了低质量原恒星源中复杂有机分子的同位素比率。研究发现在幼年恒星形成过程中，COMs的C同位素分馏呈双峰分布，且其同位素比率取决于COMs的产生方式。此外，引入直接C原子添加反应减轻了COMs的13C耗尽，更好地复制了观测结果。最后，还讨论了宇宙射线电离率对COMs的同位素比率的影响。
Recent high-resolution and sensitivity Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array observations have unveiled the carbon isotope ratios (12C/13C) of complex organic molecules (COMs) in a low-mass protostellar source. To understand the 12C/13C ratios of COMs, we investigated the carbon isotope fractionation of COMs from prestellar cores to protostellar cores with a gas-grain chemical network model. We confirmed that the 12C/13C ratios of small molecules are bimodal in the prestellar phase: CO and species formed from CO (e.g., CH3OH) are slightly enriched in 13C compared to the local interstellar medium (by ∼10%), while those from C and C+ are depleted in 13C owing to isotope exchange reactions. COMs are mainly formed on the grain surface and in the hot gas (> 100 K) in the protostellar phase. The 12C/13C ratios of COMs depend on which molecules the COMs are formed from. In our base model, some COMs in the hot gas are depleted in 13C compared to the observations. Thus, we additionally incorporate reactions between gaseous atomic C and H2O ice or CO ice on the grain surface to form H2CO ice or C2O ice, as suggested by recent laboratory studies. The direct C-atom addition reactions open pathways to form 13C-enriched COMs from atomic C and CO ice. We find that these direct C-atom addition reactions mitigate 13C-depletion of COMs, and the model with the direct C-atom addition reactions better reproduces the observations than our base model. We also discuss the impact of the cosmic-ray ionization rate on the 12C/13C ratio of COMs.

item.title: Stellar Characterization and a Chromospheric Activity Analysis of a K2 Sample of Planet-hosting Stars
item.content:encoded:
K2 mission, stellar parameters, radius gap, chromospheric activity, Fe I lines

通过K2任务观测了109颗恒星，并使用等价宽度测量了Fe I和Fe II谱线来推导恒星的有效温度、表面重力和铁丰度。结合Gaia数据释放3的视差、V星等和等时线，推导出恒星质量和半径，内部精度中位数分别为1.8%和2.3%。在这个K2样本中发现了接近Rplanet∼1.9R⊕的半径差距。使用Ca II H和K线测量了星层活动，并发现星层活动随着旋转周期(Prot)的增加而减少，尽管对于给定的Prot，存在着较大的散布(∼0.5)。这个样本中的活动水平显示出中等活动水平的F和G型矮星稀缺(沃恩-普雷斯顿间隙)。通过分析包括磁敏感Fe I线条的影响，研究了恒星活动可能对恒星参数推导的影响，发现在分析中包含磁敏感线和不包含磁敏感线时参数之间没有显著差别，尽管活跃度更高的恒星( )在Teff和[Fe/H]之间的差异中存在较大的散布。

总结: 该研究利用K2任务观测的星表数据推导了109颗恒星的参数，并发现了半径差距现象。同时研究了星层活动对参数推导的影响，结果显示了活跃恒星参数推导中的散布情况。
Effective temperatures, surface gravities, and iron abundances were derived for 109 stars observed by the K2 mission using equivalent width measurements of Fe i and Fe ii lines. Calculations were carried out in local thermodynamic equilibrium using Kurucz model atmospheres. Stellar masses and radii were derived by combining the stellar parameters with Gaia Data Release 3 parallaxes, V magnitudes, and isochrones. The derived stellar and planetary radii have a median internal precision of 1.8% and 2.3%, respectively. The radius gap near Rplanet ∼ 1.9 R⊕ was detected in this K2 sample. Chromospheric activity was measured from the Ca ii H and K lines using the values of , which were investigated as a function of stellar rotational period (Prot), and we found that chromospheric activity decreases with increasing Prot, although there is a large scatter in (∼0.5) for a given Prot. The activity levels in this sample reveal a paucity of F and G dwarfs with intermediate activity levels (the Vaughan–Preston gap). The effect that stellar activity might have on the derivation of stellar parameters was investigated by including magnetically sensitive Fe i lines in the analysis and we find no significant differences between parameters with and without magnetically sensitive lines, although the more active stars ( ) exhibit a larger scatter in the differences in Teff and [Fe/H].

item.title: Luminosity Functions of the Host Galaxies of Supernova
item.content:encoded:
超新星、宿主星系、光度函数、恒星质量函数、星体形成率
SN主机星系的光度函数和恒星质量函数与普通场星系不同。星体形成星系主导了SN Ia主机质量函数的低质量端，而被动星系主导了高质量端。CC SNe主要由星体形成星系托管。中等质量主机产生的CC SNe具有最高效率，而随着主机质量的增加，产生SNe Ia的效率单调增加。此外，根据质量函数推导出了伪质量归一化SN速率（pSNuM）。结果表明，pSNuMIa的星体形成成分对于质量的变化不太敏感，而CC速率与星体形成速率成正比。

总结:
超新星的宿主星系具有不同于普通星系的光度函数和恒星质量函数。星体形成星系托管了大部分CC SNe，并在SN Ia的质量函数中占主导地位。此外，质量函数的研究还揭示了伪质量归一化SN速率的行为。
We present the luminosity functions and stellar mass functions of supernova (SN) host galaxies and test if they differ from the functions of normal field galaxies. We utilize homogeneous samples consisting of 273 SNe Ia (z ≤ 0.3) and 44 core-collapse (CC) SNe (z ≤ 0.1) from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey II Supernova Survey and the high-signal-to-noise-ratio photometry of galaxies from the Hyper Suprime-Cam Subaru Strategic Program. SN hosts are classified into star-forming and passive galaxy groups based on the spectral energy distribution fitting. We find that the SN host luminosity functions and stellar mass functions deviate from those of normal field galaxies. Star-forming galaxies dominate the low-mass end of the SN Ia host mass function, while passive galaxies dominate the high-mass end. CC SNe are predominantly hosted by star-forming galaxies. In addition, intermediate-mass hosts produce CC SNe with the highest efficiency, while the efficiency of producing SNe Ia monotonically increases as the hosts become more massive. Furthermore, we derive the pseudo mass normalized SN rates (pSNuM) based on the mass functions. We find that the star-forming component of pSNuMIa is less sensitive to the changes in stellar mass, in comparison with the total rate. The behavior of pSNuMCC suggests that the CC rate is proportional to the star-forming rate.

item.title: Expanded Sample of Small Magellanic Cloud Ultraviolet Dust Extinction Curves: Correlations between the 2175 Å Bump, q PAH, Ultraviolet Extinction Shape, and N(H i)/A(V)
item.content:encoded:
SMC, UV extinction curves, 2175 Å bump, dust grains, Hubble Space Telescope

SMC的小麦哲伦星云在紫外光尘埃消光曲线上显示出很大的变化，范围从银河系类似的曲线到明显更陡的曲线，没有可检测到的2175 Å峰。我们通过32条SMC视线的哈勃空间望远镜和IUE光谱的OB星测量了紫外消光曲线，其中8条曲线先前已经发表。我们发现有16条缺少2175 Å峰的视线，4条有可检测到2175 Å峰的视线，2条具有相当平坦的紫外消光和弱/缺失的2175 Å峰，以及由于SMC尘埃柱的低而不可靠的10条曲线。我们的拓展样本显示，具有2175 Å峰和无2175 Å峰的视线分布于整个SMC，而不限于特定区域。缺少2175 Å峰的16条视线的平均消光曲线与以前基于四条视线的平均值非常相似。我们发现尘埃柱和2175 Å峰的强度之间没有相关性。我们检验了2175 Å峰是否源自负责中红外碳质（多环芳烃）发射特征的尘埃颗粒，发现它们相关，证实了最近在银河系的研究结果。总的来说，紫外消光的斜率随着2175 Å峰和远紫外曲线的非线性增加而增加。最后，紫外斜率与N(H i)/A(V)呈正相关，而2175 Å峰和非线性远紫外曲线的振幅与N(H i)/A(V)呈负相关。

总结: SMC的小麦哲伦星云在紫外光尘埃消光曲线上表现出很大的变化，没有2175 Å峰的视线与有2175 Å峰的视线分布于整个SMC。缺少2175 Å峰的视线的平均消光曲线与前期研究结果非常相似，尘埃柱和2175 Å峰的强度之间没有相关性。紫外消光的斜率随着2175 Å峰和远紫外曲线的非线性增加而增加，并且与N(H i)/A(V)呈正相关，而2175 Å峰和非线性远紫外曲线的振幅与N(H i)/A(V)呈负相关。
The Small Magellanic Cloud (SMC) shows a large variation in ultraviolet (UV) dust extinction curves, ranging from Milky Way (MW) like to significantly steeper curves with no detectable 2175 Å bump. This result is based on a sample of only nine sight lines. From Hubble Space Telescope Space Telescope Imaging Spectrograph and IUE spectra of OB stars, we have measured UV extinction curves along 32 SMC sight lines where eight of these curves were published previously. We find 16 sight lines with steep extinction with no detectable 2175 Å bump, four sight lines with MW-like extinction with a detectable 2175 Å bump, two sight lines with fairly flat UV extinction and weak/absent 2175 Å bumps, and 10 sight lines with unreliable curves due to low SMC dust columns. Our expanded sample shows that the sight lines with and without the 2175 Å bump are located throughout the SMC and not limited to specific regions. The average extinction curve of the 16 bump-less sight lines is very similar to the previous average based on four sight lines. We find no correlation between dust column and the strength of the 2175 Å bump. We test the hypothesis that the 2175 Å bump is due to the same dust grains that are responsible for the mid-infrared carbonaceous (polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon) emission features and find they are correlated, confirming recent work in the MW. Overall, the slope of the UV extinction increases as the amplitudes of the 2175 Å bump and far-ultraviolet curvature decrease. Finally, the UV slope is correlated with N(H i)/A(V) and the 2175 Å bump and nonlinear far-ultraviolet rise amplitudes are anticorrelated with N(H i)/A(V).

item.title: The Web Epoch of Reionization Lyα Survey (WERLS). I. MOSFIRE Spectroscopy of z ∼ 7–8 Lyα Emitters*
item.content:encoded:
Web Epoch of Reionization Lyα Survey, WERLS, spectroscopic survey, Lyα emission, Keck I/MOSFIRE and LRIS
z ∼ 7–8 Lyα emitters, UV-bright galaxy candidates, JWST deep fields, CEERS, PRIMER, COSMOS-Web, absolute UV magnitudes
11 Lyα emitters detected, observed LAE yield, ionized bubble at z = 7.68, Keck+JWST synergistic efforts

总结: 本研究报告了来自WEB Epoch of Reionization Lyα Survey（WERLS）的首批结果，这是一项利用Keck I/MOSFIRE和LRIS进行的光谱观测的Lyα发射测量。研究目标是在三个JWST深场（CEERS，PRIMER和COSMOS-Web）中的EoR内的亮度（J < 26）星系候选者，他们通过预JWST成像中的光度红移选取，红移范围为5.5≲z≲8。报告了在WERLS MOSFIRE数据的前五个夜晚中探测到的11个z∼7-8 Lyα发射者（LAEs;三个确定和八个有待考证的候选者）。作者估计观测到的LAE产额约为13％，这与预期大体一致，假设红移不确定性损失，来自天空OH线的污染，并且在这个时期宇宙大约一半是被电离的，因此在处于中性星际介质中的星系中，可能不太可能观测到Lyα发射。这些目标被选择为UV明亮，并且其绝对UV星等范围为−23.1 < MUV < −19.8。此外，在z=7.68处探测到两个LAE，作者还考虑了在这个红移处存在电离气泡的可能性。未来Keck+JWST的协同工作将为定位电离时期的信标和绘制质量的大尺度分布相对于宇宙的电离状态提供强大工具。
We present the first results from the Web Epoch of Reionization Lyα Survey (WERLS), a spectroscopic survey of Lyα emission using Keck I/MOSFIRE and LRIS. WERLS targets bright (J < 26) galaxy candidates with photometric redshifts of 5.5 ≲ z ≲ 8 selected from pre-JWST imaging embedded in the Epoch of Reionization (EoR) within three JWST deep fields: CEERS, PRIMER, and COSMOS-Web. Here, we report 11 z ∼ 7–8 Lyα emitters (LAEs; three secure and eight tentative candidates) detected in the first five nights of WERLS MOSFIRE data. We estimate our observed LAE yield is ∼13%, which is broadly consistent with expectations assuming some loss from redshift uncertainty, contamination from sky OH lines, and that the Universe is approximately half-ionized at this epoch, whereby observable Lyα emission is unlikely for galaxies embedded in a neutral intergalactic medium. Our targets are selected to be UV-bright, and span a range of absolute UV magnitudes with −23.1 < MUV < −19.8. With two LAEs detected at z = 7.68, we also consider the possibility of an ionized bubble at this redshift. Future synergistic Keck+JWST efforts will provide a powerful tool for pinpointing beacons of reionization and mapping the large-scale distribution of mass relative to the ionization state of the Universe.

item.title: Forecast of Joint Analysis of Cosmic Shear and Supernovae Magnification from the CSST and LSST
item.content:encoded:
关键词: cosmic shear, cosmic magnification, gravitational lensing, systematic bias, Markov Chain Monte Carlo
总结:
本研究通过对中国空间测量望远镜的宇宙剪切和大型同步巡天望远镜的超新星宇宙放大进行自相关和交叉相关的研究，旨在确定通过添加放大数据，能够在多大程度上消除宇宙剪切测量中的系统偏差。通过基于不同层次分析的相关性生成模拟的剪切/放大地图，得到了校正的功率谱。采用马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛技术拟合理论模型，研究了宇宙学和没用参数的限制。研究发现，仅使用宇宙剪切数据时，σ8和固有对齐模型参数存在1σ的偏差。但通过添加放大数据，可以完全消除这些偏差。

Cosmic shear and cosmic magnification reflect the same gravitational lensing field. Each of these two probes are affected by different systematics. We study the auto- and cross-correlations of cosmic shear from the China Space Survey Telescope and cosmic magnification of supernovae from the Large Synoptic Survey Telescope. We want to determine to what extent, by adding the magnification data, we can remove the systematic bias in cosmic shear measurements. We generate mock shear/magnification maps based on the correlation between different tomographic bins. After obtaining the corrected power spectra, we adopt the Markov Chain Monte Carlo technique to fit the theoretical models and investigate the constraints on the cosmological and nuisance parameters. We find that, with only the cosmic shear data, there are 1σ biases in the σ8 and intrinsic alignment model parameters. By adding the magnification data, we are able to remove these biases perfectly.

item.title: Observational Evidence for Hot Wind Impact on Parsec Scales in Low-luminosity Active Galactic Nuclei
item.content:encoded:
关键词：超大质量黑洞、活动星系核、热吹流、离子化铁发射线、X射线光谱 总结：

本文报告了在M81*和NGC 7213两个典型的低光度活动星系核中，探测到了高离化铁发射线的Doppler位移，并进一步确认了软X射线谱中的蓝移H-like O/Ne发射线。这些线被解释为与额外的具有几千千米每秒速度和较低温度的流组件相关联。经过详细的数值模拟，发现新增检测到的蓝移发射线应来自被热风冲击加热的核周气体。热风可以在颗粒状核周气体上提供比中央黑洞引力更大的冲压力，有效阻碍了黑洞对气体的吸积。这些结果为热AGN风的能量和动量反馈提供了强有力的证据。
Supermassive black holes in galaxies spend the majority of their lifetime in the low-luminosity regime, powered by hot accretion flow. Strong winds launched from the hot accretion flow have the potential to play an important role in active galactic nuclei (AGN) feedback. Direct observational evidence for these hot winds with temperatures around 10 keV, has been obtained through the detection of highly ionized iron emission lines with Doppler shifts in two prototypical low-luminosity AGNs, namely M81* and NGC 7213. In this work, we further identify blueshifted H-like O/Ne emission lines in the soft X-ray spectra of these two sources. These lines are interpreted to be associated with additional outflowing components possessing velocity around several 103 km s−1 and lower temperature (∼0.2–0.4 keV). Blueshifted velocity and the X-ray intensity of these additional outflowing components are hard to explain by previously detected hot wind freely propagating to larger radii. Through detailed numerical simulations, we find the newly detected blueshifted emission lines would come from circumnuclear gas shock-heated by the hot wind instead. Hot wind can provide a larger ram pressure force on the clumpy circumnuclear gas than the gravitational force from the central black hole, effectively impeding the black hole accretion of gas. Our results provide strong evidence for the energy and momentum feedback by the hot AGN wind.

item.title: Fleeting but Not Forgotten: The Imprint of Escaping Hydrogen Atmospheres on Super-Earth Interiors
item.content:encoded:
超级地球、次海王星、化学平衡、氢气大气、密度预测
超级地球和次海王星是两种亚类的小型外行星。研究发现，大部分超级地球通过热驱动风失去了其原初积聚的氢气大气，并且氢气会被有效地嵌入到内部，氧化铁并产生约0.5%至1.0%的水。由于大气不断被加工和化学平衡，尽管按摩尔比例氢气仍然占主导地位，按质量比例而言却变成了以蒸汽为主导。这可能可以通过JWST观测到具有过渡性质量的行星。有效地将氢气嵌入到内部的一个主要效果是使得整体内部密度低于地球。我们预测1M⊕行星的整体密度约为5.0 g cm−3，这与高精度的质量测量以及大气逸出模型的族群级推断分析是一致的。

总结: 本文研究了超级地球和次海王星的化学平衡，发现大部分超级地球通过热驱动风失去了氢气大气，并且氢气会被有效地嵌入到内部，导致产生约0.5%至1.0%的水。大气通过加工和化学平衡持续演变，并且氢气逐渐被嵌入到内部。根据预测，这种有效的氢气嵌入会使得超级地球整体内部密度低于地球。
Small, close-in exoplanets are divided into two subpopulations: super-Earths and sub-Neptunes. Most super-Earths are thought to have lost their primordially accreted hydrogen-dominated atmospheres via thermally driven winds. We consider the global chemical equilibrium of super-Earths and the lasting impacts of their fleeting hydrogen atmospheres. We find that hydrogen is efficiently sequestered into the interior, oxidizing iron and endogenously producing ∼0.5%–1.0% water by mass. As the atmospheres of super-Earths are continuously sculpted by mass loss and chemical equilibration, they remain hydrogen-dominated by mole (number) fraction but become steam-dominated by mass, which may be observable with JWST for planets transitioning across the radius valley. One of the main effects of efficient sequestration of hydrogen into the interior is to produce an underdense bulk interior compared to that of Earth. We predict bulk densities of super-Earths to be ∼5.0 g cm−3 for a 1M⊕ planet, which is consistent with high-precision mass measurements and also population-level inference analyses from atmospheric escape models.

item.title: Importance of Initial Condition on Bar Secular Evolution: Role of Halo Angular Momentum Distribution Discontinuity
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 暗物质晕、角动量分布、盘状星系、棒状结构、演化
总结: 这项研究强调了暗物质晕的角动量分布对盘状星系中棒状结构的形成和演化具有重要作用。通过N体模拟实验发现，角动量分布连续的暗物质晕会增强棒状结构的强度，而分布不连续的暗物质晕会减弱棒状结构的强度。这一发现有助于解决近期文献中关于高自旋暗物质晕中棒状结构演化的矛盾结果。因此，该研究显示了盘状星系系统初始条件设置的重要性，特别是暗物质晕角动量分布的不连续性，对棒状结构的演化产生了重要影响。
The dark matter halo properties, for example, mass, spin, and concentration, play a significant role in the formation and evolution of bars in disk galaxies. This study highlights the importance of a new parameter: the dark matter halo angular momentum distribution in the disk’s central region. We experiment with N-body galaxy models having a disk and dark matter similar to Milky Way–type galaxies. In these models, we vary the discontinuity of the angular momentum distribution of the halo (the total spin is the same for all models). Our N-body experiments suggest that bar forms in all models after a few Gyr of disk evolution. However, in the secular evolution of the bar, as we evolve these models until 9.78 Gyr, the bar gains its strength in the model with the most continuous halo angular momentum distribution, and the bar loses strength for the most discontinuous halo angular momentum distribution. The secular evolution of the bar suggests that box/peanut/x-shaped bulges similar to those found in the Milky Way disk should be more pronounced in halos with continuous halo angular momentum distributions. This study demonstrates the importance of the initial condition setup of galaxy systems, namely the discontinuity in the dark matter halo angular momentum distribution for a given density distribution, on the bar secular evolution in the disk galaxy simulations. Further, this study helps reconcile the conflicting results of bar secular evolution in a high-spinning halo of the recent literature.

item.title: Evidence for Spatially Distinct Galactic Dust Populations
item.content:encoded:
高斯混合模型，哈密尔顿蒙特卡洛，银河尘埃，频谱能量分布，黑体函数
银河尘埃分析，通过哈密尔顿蒙特卡洛技术实现了贝叶斯混合模型，研究银河尘埃的空间分离情况。我们发现了空间变化的两种尘埃模型，每种尘埃模型都有单一组分的频谱能量分布，并且能够适应小的变化。这些不同的尘埃种群在βd与Td平面上存在2.5σ的温度与谱指数的差异。这些结果对于常用的宇宙微波背景分离技术有重要意义。总结：
本研究利用哈密尔顿蒙特卡洛技术实现了贝叶斯混合模型，发现了在空间上呈现强烈相关结构的两种不同的银河尘埃种群。这些种群在频谱能量分布和温度方面存在显著差异，对于宇宙微波背景的分离技术有重要意义。
We present an implementation of a Bayesian mixture model using Hamiltonian Monte Carlo techniques to search for the spatial separation of Galactic dust populations. Utilizing intensity measurements from the Planck High Frequency Instrument, we apply this model to high-latitude Galactic dust emission. Our analysis reveals a strong preference for a spatially varying two-population dust model over a one-population dust model, when the latter must capture the total variance in the sky. Each dust population is well characterized by a single-component spectral energy distribution (SED) and accommodates small variations. These populations could signify two distinct components or may originate from a one-component model with different temperatures resulting in different SED scalings. While no spatial information is built into the likelihood, our investigation unveils large-scale spatially coherent structures with high significance, pointing to a physical origin for the observed spatial variation. These results are robust to our choice of likelihood and input data. Furthermore, this spatially varying two-population model is the most favored from Bayesian evidence calculations. Incorporating IRAS 100 μm to constrain the Wein side of the blackbody function, we find the dust populations differ at the 2.5σ level in the spectral index (βd) versus temperature (Td) plane. The presence of multiple dust populations has implications for component separation techniques frequently employed in the recovery of the cosmic microwave background.

item.title: Detectability of Axisymmetric Magnetic Fields from the Core to the Surface of Oscillating Post-main-sequence Stars
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 磁场, 恒星内部, 频率分裂, 磁场强度, 恒星演化 总结: 恒星内部的磁场对太阳类恒星的核自转速率有重要影响。研究利用频谱的频率分裂得出了24个红巨星内氢燃烧壳附近径向磁场振幅的估计结果。通过Lorentz应力核函数，研究了超太阳金属丰度1.3M⊙恒星从中亚巨星到晚亚巨星再到红巨星的演化过程中，近表面磁场的探测潜力。将红巨星和亚巨星分成不同区域进行分解，并提出了关于关键层中磁场强度的下限。这项理论方案为恒星磁场的逆问题提供了首次形式化方法，并可以无缝应用于慢自转的恒星。

Magnetic fields in the stellar interiors are key candidates to explain observed core rotation rates inside solar-like stars along their evolution. Recently, asteroseismic estimates of radial magnetic field amplitudes near the hydrogen-burning shell (H-shell) inside about 24 red giants (RGs) have been obtained by measuring frequency splittings from their power spectra. Using general Lorentz-stress (magnetic) kernels, we investigated the potential for detectability of near-surface magnetism in a 1.3 M⊙ star of supersolar metallicity as it evolves from a mid subgiant to a late subgiant into an RG. Based on these sensitivity kernels, we decompose an RG into three zones—deep core, H-shell, and near-surface. The subgiants instead required decomposition into an inner core, an outer core, and a near-surface layer. Additionally, we find that for a low-frequency g-dominated dipolar mode in the presence of a typical stable magnetic field, ∼25% of the frequency shift comes from the H-shell and the remaining from deeper layers. The ratio of the subsurface tangential field to the radial field in the H-burning shell decides if subsurface fields may be potentially detectable. For p-dominated dipole modes close to , this ratio is around two orders of magnitude smaller in subgiant phases than the corresponding RG. Further, with the availability of magnetic kernels, we propose lower limits of field strengths in crucial layers in our stellar model during its evolutionary phases. The theoretical prescription outlined here provides the first formal way to devise inverse problems for stellar magnetism and can be seamlessly employed for slow rotators.

item.title: Multiphase Black Hole Feedback and a Bright [C ii] Halo in a LoBAL Quasar at z ∼ 6.6
item.content:encoded:
quasar, outflow, feedback, ALMA, black hole

总结: 研究团队对 z ∼ 6.6 类星体 J0923+0402 的黑洞驱动流进行了多尺度和多相特征化，并评估了这些气流对冷气体储库的影响。他们发现在约210 pc的尺度上存在一个强劲的电离气流，并且ALMA观测发现了高速度的[C ii]发射，可能与主宇宙体内含的冷中性气体有关，以及一个大小约15 kpc的[C ii]光晕。该研究首次准确限制了离子化和原子中性气体相的气流能量学特征，发现这种特征与高效反馈机制相一致，并且可能存在排出和预防性反馈模式。离子化气流和原子气流的尺度和能量特征表明它们可能与不同的类星体吸积事件相关联。该研究结果表明在 z ≳ 6 处的类星体中存在强烈的黑洞反馈作用，很可能塑造了冷气体储库的性质，直至周银河范围。
Although the mass growth of supermassive black holes during the epoch of reionization is expected to play a role in shaping the concurrent growth of their host galaxies, observational evidence of feedback at z ≳ 6 is still sparse. We perform the first multiscale and multiphase characterization of black-hole-driven outflows in the z ∼ 6.6 quasar J0923+0402 and assess how these winds impact the cold gas reservoir. We employ the SimBAL spectral synthesis to fit broad absorption line features and find a powerful ionized outflow on a ≲210 pc scale, with a kinetic power ∼2%–100% of the quasar luminosity. Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA) observations of [C ii] emission allow us to study the morphology and kinematics of the cold gas. We detect high-velocity [C ii] emission, likely associated with a cold neutral outflow at ∼0.5−2 kpc scale in the host galaxy, and a bright extended [C ii] halo with a size of ∼15 kpc. For the first time at such an early epoch, we accurately constrain the outflow energetics in both the ionized and the atomic neutral gas phases. We find such energetics to be consistent with expectations for an efficient feedback mechanism, and both ejective and preventative feedback modes are likely at play. The scales and energetics of the ionized and atomic outflows suggest that they might be associated with different quasar accretion episodes. The results of this work indicate that strong black hole feedback is occurring in quasars at z ≳ 6 and is likely responsible for shaping the properties of the cold gas reservoir up to circumgalactic scales.

item.title: Cholla-MHD: An Exascale-capable Magnetohydrodynamic Extension to the Cholla Astrophysical Simulation Code
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: Cholla, MHD, GPU, exascale supercomputer, simulation
总结: Cholla是一种GPU原生的天体物理流体动力学代码，现在扩展到了磁流体动力学（MHD）模拟。该代码利用GPU并行计算，在NVIDIA A100上的表现非常出色，可以实现极大规模的模拟。磁流体动力学模块经过测试，保持了高精度和可靠性。同时，引入了新的测试和CI工具，提高了开发的鲁棒性和准确性。 <div> We present an extension of the massively parallel, GPU native, astrophysical hydrodynamics code Cholla to magnetohydrodynamics (MHD). Cholla solves the ideal MHD equations in their Eulerian form on a static Cartesian mesh utilizing the Van Leer + constrained transport integrator, the HLLD Riemann solver, and reconstruction methods at second and third order. Cholla’s MHD module can perform ≈260 million cell updates per GPU-second on an NVIDIA A100 while using the HLLD Riemann solver and second order reconstruction. The inherently parallel nature of GPUs combined with increased memory in new hardware allows Cholla’s MHD module to perform simulations with resolutions ∼5003 cells on a single high-end GPU (e.g., an NVIDIA A100 with 80 GB of memory). We employ GPU direct Message Passing Interface to attain excellent weak scaling on the exascale supercomputer Frontier, while using 74,088 GPUs and simulating a total grid size of over 7.2 trillion cells. A suite of test problems highlights the accuracy of Cholla’s MHD module and demonstrates that zero magnetic divergence in solutions is maintained to round off error. We also present new testing and CI tools using GoogleTest, GitHub Actions, and Jenkins that have made development more robust and accurate and ensure reliability in the future.

item.title: Cloud Dissipation and Disk Wind in the Late Phase of Star Formation
item.content:encoded:
磁流体动力学, 恒星形成, 盘形成, 磁性制动, 螺旋结构 长期模拟研究恒星和盘的形成过程，采用三维非理想磁流体动力学。模拟从原恒星云开始，经过盘的长期演化，最终距离原恒星形成约1.5x10^5年。主要的磁力制动和磁驱动的流出作用导致主要的吸积阶段盘的大小约为50天文单位并且主要没有次级结构。当流出突破云层时，导致包层质量迅速减少，主要吸积阶段结束。流出在质量吸积率减小的同时也减弱。盘的包层吸积结束后，盘逐渐增长并出现瞬时的螺旋结构，这是由于引力不稳定性导致的。当包层吸积结束后，盘变得稳定并且达到约300天文单位大小。此外，约30%的初始云质量被流出排斥。研究的一个重要发现是，包层消散后，流出出现再次活跃，盘表面有质量排出，这种排出（或盘风）是因为此时磁压显著支配了盘的上下方面的动压和热压。利用估计的角动量通量和质量损失率，估算盘消散的时间尺度约为10^6年。

总结: 本研究使用三维非理想磁流体动力学模拟了恒星和盘的形成过程。模拟表明，磁性制动和磁驱动的流出在主要的吸积阶段起到重要作用。当主要吸积阶段结束后，盘逐渐增长并发展出临时的螺旋结构，最终盘变得稳定并且达到较大规模。研究还发现，包层消散后，盘表面出现质量排出，推测盘的消散时间尺度约为10^6年。
We perform a long-term simulation of star and disk formation using three-dimensional nonideal magnetohydrodynamics. The simulation starts from a prestellar cloud and proceeds through the long-term evolution of the circumstellar disk until ∼1.5 × 105 yr after protostar formation.
